Metadata.title: Blockchain Bet Brasil | Alliance of 625
Metadata.description: The Last Lottery Secret Revealed. Decentralized Prediction Protocol on Base Network.

Home.subtitle: Blockchain Bet Brasil - The Alliance of 625.
Home.subtext: Rewriting destinies through mathematics. No walls, no owners.
Home.pulseText: The prize ALWAYS has an owner. Win with 5, 4, 3, 2 or 1 point!
Home.description: The first decentralized distribution system where 90% of everything collected is returned to the players. Operated by Smart Contracts and Chainlink VRF on Base.
Home.card1Desc: The contract has no owner. No one can change the rules, pause withdrawals, or manipulate the matrix. Code is Law.
Home.card2Desc: We use Chainlink VRF to ensure absolute randomness. Every result is generated off-chain and validated on-chain.
Home.card3Desc: 90% of the total collected per round is locked in the contract and distributed. We play on your side.

InterBet.title: Choose your
InterBet.desc: Two entry levels, the same mathematical certainty. Define your stake in the global pool.
InterBet.basicDesc: Explore the Alliance with low entry cost and full 625 Matrix access.
InterBet.proDesc: For high-performance players focused on aggressive multipliers and massive volume.

Apostas.title: Your Prediction
Apostas.matrixSub: Select exactly 5 coordinates from the 25x25 grid.
Apostas.audit: Your entry will be eternally registered on Base and audited by Chainlink VRF.
Apostas.modalDesc: Your predictions are now immutable on the Blockchain.
Apostas.alertWallet: Connect your wallet to enter the Alliance.
Apostas.alertFill: Select all 5 pairs to complete the matrix!

ComoFunciona.title: The 625 Matrix
ComoFunciona.desc: Success is a calculation. Our system uses a 25x25 reference grid, creating 625 strategic possibilities.
ComoFunciona.card1Desc: Choose 5 coordinates (e.g., 12/25). Your selection order determines your tier from 1 to 5 points.
ComoFunciona.card2Desc: Rounds close every Saturday. Chainlink VRF triggers the audited result directly on-chain.
ComoFunciona.card3Desc: On Sundays, the Cascade Effect is calculated and winners claim their shares directly to their wallets.
ComoFunciona.step1Desc: Every entry generates a BaseScan link. Your numbers are saved in the block forever.
ComoFunciona.step2Desc: Use 'Decode Input Data' on BaseScan to see your human-readable coordinates recorded in the contract.
ComoFunciona.step3Desc: Once confirmed, not even the developers can change your bet. Strategy meets immutability.

Premiacao.title: The Alliance Code
Premiacao.desc: A fair protocol: 90% of every round goes back to the people. No middlemen.
Premiacao.matrixDesc: 25x25 grid. The highest winning probability ever designed for a digital lottery.
Premiacao.payoutDesc: 90% of everything collected is locked for distribution. More for you, less for the house.
Premiacao.cascadeDesc1: The prize never vanishes. If the top tier has no winners, the value 'flows down' to the next tiers immediately.
Premiacao.distributionDesc: Calculated over 90% of the total round collection.
Premiacao.distributionNote: The gross prize is equivalent to 90% of the total amount collected, per round, distributed proportionally in equal shares among winners in each tier.
Premiacao.rolloverDesc1: If no one scores, the prize mutates. Next round receives a +40% bonus injected into every tier. Victory becomes inevitable.

Resultados.title: Alliance Results
Resultados.connectWallet: Connect your wallet to check your standing.

Footer.allRightsReserved: Decentralized Alliance Protocol. All rights reserved.
